{{Infobox armor poe2
| name              = Miscreant's Leathers
| icon              = poe2 leather_armor_miscreant icon.png
| description       = Though this cuirass features light, supple leather with intricately tooled designs along the edges, the most notable fact about it is that you claimed it from Benweth, the man who welcomed you to the Deadfire by having his freebooters board your ship. It bears the mended scars of numerous engagements at land and sea, each testament to a wrong not quite righted.
